description: Spirituous and aromatic with rich honey notes balancing bitter gentian.
name: Paycheck
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Gin (infused with Earl Grey tea)
15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
10 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: RINSE chilled glass with absinthe and set aside
STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into absinthe rinsed glass
